Stacks browsing is not currently available, but patrons can request physical materials for pickup by using the “Request Item” feature in Virgo. When you make your request, you can select from any open Library locations. Note that location options may change through the semester.

Pickup at Library building

To request items for at a Library building, simply request an item in Virgo, specify your pickup location, and instructions for pickup will follow in email once your item is ready to be picked up. Read more about how to make a request in the Virgo catalog. This option is available to students, staff, and faculty at UVA. 

Pickup at Central Grounds Parking Garage (“LEO Mobile”)

Note: This service is currently only available to UVA faculty and graduate students. 

LEO Mobile offers pickup windows several days a week for faculty and graduate students to retrieve their requested items on the 2nd level of the Central Grounds Parking Garage. 

To use LEO Mobile:

  • Find the item you wish to request in Virgo, and follow the instructions to make a request for the item.
  • When you’re prompted to select a Pickup Location, choose “Central Grounds Parking Garage (LEO Mobile)”. If for some reason the service is not available, it will not show in the drop-down menu.  
  • When your item is ready, you will receive an email prompting you to select your pickup day. LEO Mobile requires you to specify which day you intend to pick up because of limited space in delivery vans.
    • At this time, LEO Mobile pickup is available on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, from 1 – 4 p.m.
    • Contrasted with LEO Mobile, Clemons and Brown pickup locations do not require you to specify a pickup day thanks to ample shelving space.
  • To pick up:
    • On your pickup day, between 1 - 4  p.m.,  walk or drive to the Central Grounds Parking Garage. Locate the LEO van which will be parked near the book drop (on the northeast side of the building, adjacent to Newcomb Hall) on the 2nd level.
      • See a map of all current Library locations (PDF).
      • No payment is required to enter the Garage for the purpose of picking up books.
    • Items will be placed in a bag labeled with the patron’s name. A staff member will be nearby (at a safe social distance) to monitor the service and answer questions.
    • Find the bag labeled with your name, and enjoy your day!
